snippet: A survey by the writers’ organization PEN American Center has found that a large majority of its members are deeply concerned about the extent of government surveillance of email and phone records.
abstract: Survey by writers’ organization PEN American Center finds that large majority of its members are deeply concerned about extent of government surveillance of email and phone records.
lead_paragraph: A survey by the writers’ organization PEN American Center has found that a large majority of its members are deeply concerned about the extent of government surveillance of email and phone records.

headline.seo: PEN American Center Survey Finds Caution Among Members
